tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Niken shah is very friendly.I had taken my mother who is 80 yrs of age.She is his old patient.Went to him after7 yrs.still he recognized her ,sat quietly next to her,answered all her questions including silly once . Suggested her further treatment.He has two three junior Drs who will explain in detail about the further treatment ,reports to be done, prescription details . Everything...All this inspite of very busy rush of patients waiting.

tags: None
review:
My experience after meeting the doctor was good. I explained him all my problems related to my knee pain and he explained me in details about the solution to get partly relief to my acute pain in knee.
In my case he suggested for TKR (right knee) as there was no other possible solution. I have tried all medicinal remedies, physiotherapy etc., but could not get relief.

listened all my queries calmly and and satisfactory.

review: please don't go to him *** **** **** *******my mothers operation was the 8th operation of the day by 8:30pm.no post care after surgery. *** **** ********** ** * **** Overworked staff, so no attention on patients Today my mother is critically unwell.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My knee replacement surgery was done by Dr Nilen Shah, i was admitted at Cumbala hill hospital.however neither he nor any of his fellows came to see me either before or after the surgery. I had tons of questions to ask about post surgery recovery. After my repeated requests, the hospital staff conveyed it to the doctor, and only then almost 24 hrs later ,just an hour before my discharge,one of his assistant fellow came to visit. This according to me was most unprofessional
Even today, a month post surgery, i have no access to the Doctor on phone if i have a problem...i ve to contact his assistant and make do with his "expert" opinion.
That's my only reason for not recommending the doctor, as I feel , that only the doctor's reassurance and personal guidance can make you feel relieved and comfortable post Surgery

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very good. He made me comfortable before the surgery and during the surgery as well. Excellent service.
